Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Many months later...'}
{3: 'Iris, who had vanished without a trace for a long time, finally sent another letter.'}
{1: 'My dear 【kuroname】:', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I never thought I'd have the chance to send you another letter.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Thank you for your kind words. Even though I received it months after you sent it, my soul still got a modicum of comfort.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "There's something I have to tell you. I've become a Construct.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Yes, I chose to become a Construct and the whole process went smoothly. That's why I can still write to you like before.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Given how things are, there's no need to hide this anymore. I've joined WGAA's Archaeological Team.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Becoming a Construct has been... an unbelievable experience. As if my perspective of the world has changed overnight.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Sometimes I'm not even sure if the person writing to you is the same old me.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Not long ago, I learned how to use a weapon in battle.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I may just be a Support Construct, but at least I have the strength to protect others now.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>I thought that by becoming a Construct, I'd be able to fight in battle and partake in missions,<para\\>perhaps even meet you someday on the battlefield and use the strength I have to protect you.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "But it seems this hasn't been the case. The Archaeological Team doesn't need to be on the frontlines.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Most of our time is spent investigating relics from human history, recycling and repairing them.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: "But it's fine.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I wouldn't feel comfortable meeting you while I'm still getting used to this body. I'd like to be my best self when I meet you, so please be patient.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'I have so much to tell you and words can no longer express these feelings. I wish to tell all of this to you in person.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Actually, the World Government Association of Art is holding a ball next month.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Would you be my dance partner?', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Yours sincerely,', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Iris', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{2: '(Pick up a pen and write a response)', 3: '27'}
{1: 'Iris:', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm glad you're on track.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Regarding the ball—', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm honored.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'However...', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'You receive a reply the following day.'}
{1: '【kuroname】:', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'There is something I must tell you.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'There is no need to worry about trivial matters. The purpose of dancing is to have fun, not to "perform".', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Besides, there's no one in this world who doesn't know how to dance. It all boils down to whether you're willing to or not.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "As long as you're willing, no matter how much of a beginner you are, I'll be able to lead you through the most perfect dance.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "My education has trained me to lead and follow in dance, no matter whether it's tango, waltz, or rumba... There's no dance that I'm not able to do.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Perhaps I didn't have the strength before, but now, I can easily twirl you around.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "All you have to do is trust me, follow my moves, and it'll all go smoothly.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Then it's settled.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "This is the address. Don't stand me up again.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'll be waiting for you.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'll be wearing an Iris behind my ear. You'll recognize me for sure.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory15.jpg'}
{3: 'The time to meet has arrived.'}
{3: 'There are bright lights outside the WGAA. In the exquisite courtyard, there are groups of association members.'}
{3: 'There are Constructs and humans alike.'}
{3: 'Standing for what feels like ages at the door, there is no sign of the girl with an iris pinned behind her ear.'}
{3: 'The melodious orchestra filled the venue, playing a "One Step Away", a classic tango song.'}
{3: 'Perhaps you really are one step away, because the dance has ended, and she still has not shown up.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'You open your mailbox when you are home.'}
{3: 'There was a letter that had just arrived.'}
{2: '(Open and take a look)', 3: '59'}
{1: '【kuroname】:', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm sorry, I really am. President Allen suddenly assigned me to a mission at a moment's notice.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Babylonia is about to transit the space station's orbit. As a member of the Archaeological Team, I was appointed to retrieve intel on the space station.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "The situation is urgent. I'm leaving soon. I can't go to the dance.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I wanted to break the news to you immediately, but I realized that other than your address, I didn't have any other way to contact you.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>Sometimes I get really annoyed with myself. Why was I so fixated on this ritual in the first place?<para\\>So much so that I didn't even ask you for your comms account.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I don't know when you'll receive this letter, but by the time you see it, I'll probably have set off.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It feels like every time we're about to meet, something like this happens.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'And each time, we miss the chance because something crops up.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "There's so much I haven't told you. Please wait for me and next time, I'll definitely make it happen.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Archaeology Team Member', 3: 'Selena, what are you up to? We need to get going. The members of the Task Force is getting impatient.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "Um... Sorry, I'm writing.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Selena seals the letter with hot wax and hurriedly stands up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "Sorry to keep you waiting. Let me send this letter and I'll report for duty.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Archaeology Team Member', 3: "What's so pressing? Don't tell me that you're writing your last will and testament like a soldier about to go on an expedition... We're just the Archaeological Team, after all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Of course not. It's just a personal letter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Archaeology Team Member', 3: 'Is this a love—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Please don't make fun of me.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Selena's voice takes on a rare reproaching tone, but she makes no attempt to deny it."}
{3: 'Little did anyone know that a smile even more beautiful than an Iris was spreading across her lips, betraying her true emotions.'}
{3: "However, the flower of Eden didn't know that this was the calm before the storm."}
{3: 'It was also the last time she could ever smile like this.'}
